class.name: GameplayAbility
class.brief_description: A resource that defines a gameplay action or skill.
class.description: [GameplayAbility] is a resource that defines the behavior of an action (such as jumping, attacking, or casting a spell). It includes costs (attributes), cooldowns, tags requirements, and the logic itself (override [code]_activate_ability[/code]).

method.name: _activate_ability
method.description: Override this method to implement the ability logic (e.g., spawn projectile, play animation).

method.name: _can_activate
method.description: Override this check custom activation conditions. Return true if can activate.

method.name: activate_ability
method.description: Activates the ability on the given ASC. Checks costs and cooldowns internally unless bypassed.

method.name: can_activate
method.description: Returns true if the ability can be currently activated (checking tags, costs, cooldowns).

method.name: end_ability
method.description: Call this to end the ability execution. Important for abilities with duration or state.
